data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Pashchim Champaran, Bihar, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pashchim Champaran, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 3,843,970, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Pashchim Champaran, Bihar, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, encourage the 43,285 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Pashchim Champaran to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Rajput Palwar people.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Pashchim Champaran, Bihar, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Pashchim Champaran, Bihar, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Pashchim Champaran, Bihar, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Pashchim Champaran
location.people_groups_list: Bhoi Kharot, Badhai (Hindu traditions), Yadav (Muslim traditions), Kalwar Iraqi (Muslim traditions), Bhoi Ghogra
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bhoi Kharot (177,000), Badhai (Hindu traditions) (6,497,000), Yadav (Muslim traditions) (8,600), Kalwar Iraqi (Muslim traditions) (42,000), Bhoi Ghogra (52,000)
